text: “Nena (mowafunsa): “Nzayani zomwe zili kumwamba ndi pansi?” Nena kwa iwo (ngati sakuyankha): “Nza Allah.” Iye wadzikakamiza kuwachitira chifundo (anthu Ake). (Pachifukwa chimenechi amawapatsa nthawi osawalanga mwachangu). Ndithudi adzakusonkhanitsani tsiku la Qiyâma lopanda chikaiko. Amene adzitaya okha, sakhulupirira (za tsikulo)
